activities:
The data processed under the Safe Harbor Framework from the Domino’s Pizza master franchisees and sub-franchisees in the European Union will be customer and order data captured in Domino’s proprietary point-of-sale, and on-line ordering systems.  
This data will be imported into Domino's data warehouse systems to be made available to franchisees on Domino’s U.S.-based servers.  This will be for warehousing, processing of reports, and analytics for the benefit of the master franchisee and sub-franchisee stores in the European Union.
eucountries: Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Denmark, France, Germany, Greece, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Master and sub-franchisee store-level customer and sales data
recoursemech: Domino’s Pizza will be using a private sector dispute resolution program.  Domino’s has contracted with TRUSTe for this purpose.
